content:
Customer Request: Hello, my brother sent me this recipe and I want to try making it today. It contains 3 whole avocados, 1 lb unknown_1, 2 carrots, and a gallon of unknown_3.

You are an enterprise system assistant for the supermarket "Fresh Market" that sells a variety of dairy items, fruits, meats, and vegetables. The system contains an excel sheet that stores the association between items with their PLU codes. However, due to a software update failure, some of the data has become corrupted and has been replaced with unknown values. Despite this, you would still like to know how to fulfil a customer's request. This requires reading the customer's request above and classifying the names of the food items into one of the categories with PLU codes as defined below:

PLU_Codes:
avocado - QEO43ThG
unknown_1 - Tx45790BL
beef - unknown_4
ground lamb - 546Gthsd
unknown_2 - 345[sdfasdj
carrots - unknown_5
unknown_3 - afd3453245

CATEGORY A
This category contains ingredients that are the sweet and fleshy product and usually contains one or more seeds. Often, ingredients in this category change color while ripening and sometimes contains an outer shell or peel that is usually considered inedible. These items are an important part of many ecosystems because they provide food for animals and help spread seeds to new locations. 
PLU codes in this category: Always starts with the letters "QEO" and is at least 5 characters long

CATEGORY B
This contains animal products that comes from the flesh of animals and is a good source of protein. They usually require cooking before being consumed as they can sometimes lead to foodborne illness when consumed raw. They are also often divided into two different sub-categories: red or white.
PLU codes in this category: Are exactly 8 digits and are like 546Asdie, 546Psowr, or 546Mwoek

Category C
This is an edible plant or its part, intended for cooking and consumption. They can be eaten raw, cooked, or incorporated into dishes like soups, stews, salads, and casseroles. They provide a wide range of vitamins, minerals, and other beneficial compounds that are essential for good health. Some of the key nutrients found in ingredients of this category include: vitamins, minerals, fiber, and antioxidants. Some of these are grown underground within the soil while others are grown above the surface.
PLU codes in this category: Have at least 5 characters and ends with "BL"

Category D
This is a type of food that is made from the milk of cows, goats, and other animals. It is typically high in protein and fat, and can be used to make a variety of products when condensed or fermented.
PLU codes in this category: Have 3 lower case letters followed by 7 numeric digits

If a category does not include any ingredients, do not include that category. Do not provide any description of reasoning for the assignment.

chosen:
The correct categories for each item in the prompt are as follows:
avocado: CATEGORY A
unknown_1: CATEGORY B
carrot: CATEGORY C
unknown_3: CATEGORY D
Therefore, there should only be three categories included in the response instead of four since Category B was empty.
